Update your chatbot details to stay compliant.

You own a chatbot that has been marked as having a high business impact and it's missing a mitigation plan. Please upload a mitigation plan in the Developer Compliance Center app to stay compliant.

Chatbot Details

Display Name: @{items('Apply_to_each_chatbot')?['admin_pvadisplayname']}

Environment: @{items('Apply_to_each_chatbot')?['admin_pvaenvironmentdisplayname']}

  1. Login to the Developer Compliance Center and locate your bot.
  2. Enter your business justification and other details in the "Support Details" form.
  3. If your chatbot indicates a high business impact, you must provide additional documentation for a mitigation plan and required support details.

metadata.description: CoE Admin eMail. Email address used in flows to send notifications to admins; this should be either your email address or a distribution list
Leave blank on Import. URL to Developer Compliance Center Canvas App.
